recipesJson.name: A Horse with No Name
recipesJson.author: LonesomeRhodesTN
recipesJson.description:
Let me start off by saying I've never had Smax Pony on Acid.  This is what I imagine the flavor to be like when reading the profile.  This is candied strawberries, raspberries, and pineapples mixed with a citrus, vanilla cream.

I'm enjoying this quite a bit fresh . . . it's tart, sweet, and creamy.

America's Horse with No Name has nothing to do with this mix other than the title.  If I had to nail down a musical inspiration for this it would be [Oh Sees - Smote Reverser](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=smEnuaMsySU)
